data.name: Spesial Panta Ilis
data.details: Juicy and flavorful Spesial Panta Ilis that's perfect for a weeknight dinner. Made with simple ingredients and ready in under an hour.

data.name: Spesial Ilis vaja
data.details: A delicate and sweet Spesial Ilis vaja made with a flaky crust and fresh raspberry filling. The perfect dessert for any occasion.

data.name: Ilis vaja and vorta
data.details: A classic dish made with high-quality isil, gooey melted vorta, and all the fixings. Satisfy your cravings with this ultimate comfort food.
